item.description:
Information Packed Presentation Reveals . . .

How to Fill Any Vacancy in 72 Hours, For Top Market Rent, in a Competitive Market

Eliminate your landlording headaches! Do far more than just survive as a landlord. Jeffrey will show you how to fill your vacancies fast, even in a competitive market!

Jeffrey Taylor is known nationwide as "Mr. Landlord," and has taught thousands of real estate investors, landlords and managers how to fill their vacancies in just 72 hours and keep residents for 6 years. On Wednesday, May 12, 2010, he'll show you how to do it!

He's the author of the bestselling books The Landlord's Survival Guide & The Landlord's Kit. He's America's #1 landlording coach, a successful landlord with over 25 years experience and founder of MrLandlord.com, home of the most visited landlord Q&A website in the nation for nation for rental owners.

If you're completely frustrated with your house sitting empty, or worse, having poor performing residents sitting in them. If you're ready to hear from someone who has a waiting list of ideal residents, then you can't miss Jeffrey's presentation. He'll completely transform the way you see landlording.

Discover How to Hill a Vacancy in 72 Hours

Let Jeffrey, Mr Landlord, show you:

How to keep the phone ringing with many qualified prospects
How to get vacating residents to be totally cooperative with you
How to have property in move in condition BEFORE they move out
How to increase the odds prospects will fill out an application today!
How to increase your monthly cash flow when you fill your vacancies

NHREIA March Monthly Meeting

When: 6:30 pm, Wednesday May 14, 2010

Where: Best Western Executive Court, 13500 South Willow Street, Manchester

Cost: Free for NHREIA members; only $20 for visitors and meetup members
item.name: The New Hampshire Real Estate Investors Association Monthly Meetup
